channel.title: Reverse on Curiositas
channel.description: Recent content in Reverse on Curiositas

item.title: Writeups of some FCSC challenges
item.description: This are little write-ups for challenges of the France Cybersecurity Challenge CTF of 2020. I finished 123/633 in the Senior category and 217/1591 in the general ranking. I will try harder next year, I promise. Summary Intro Le rat conteur Poney TarteTatin Babel Web Misc Randomito Baby Xoring Networks Reverse Infiltrate Web Rainbow Pages EnterTheDungeon Revision Bestiary Intro Le rat conteur openssl enc -aes-128-ctr -d -in flag.
